sentences: Ma annaksin sulle oma viimase koha.
Kui ta k√ºsiks, siis ma annaksin talle vastuse.
Olen kindel, et ta annaksin mulle naest.
context: The word 'annaksin' is the first person singular conditional form of the Estonian verb 'anna', meaning 'to give'. It translates to 'I would give' in English. This form indicates a hypothetical or future action that depends on certain conditions being met.
